languages.text: "Что же, я развлеку тебя игрой ума, которая принята в нашем конклаве. Суть проста: я говорю факт о себе, а ты пытаешься понять, правда это или ложь. Приступим: я предал свой род, погубил неповинных людей, и мне это сошло с рук".

"I suppose you desire entertainment. Very well. I will give you something to occupy your time — a simple game of intellect that is often played in our conclave. I will give you a fact about my life, and you will have to discern whether it is a truth or a lie. Shall we begin? I betrayed my family and caused the death of innocent people, and I was never held accountable for my actions."
languages.original_text: "Что же, я развлеку тебя игрой ума, которая принята в нашем конклаве. Суть проста: я говорю факт о себе, а ты пытаешься понять, правда это или ложь. Приступим: я предал свой род, погубил неповинных людей, и мне это сошло с рук".

traits.locale_text: "Well, then, I will occupy you with a game of intellect customary for our conclave. It's simple: I give you a fact about my biography, and you try to discern whether it is a truth or a lie. Let's begin. I have betrayed my family, caused the death of innocent people, and got away with it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

I betrayed my family and caused the death of innocent people, and I was never held accountable for my actions."

languages.text: « Je suppose que vous souhaitez que je vous divertisse. Très bien, j'ai de quoi vous occuper : je vous propose un simple jeu de réflexion auquel on joue souvent dans notre conclave. Je vais énoncer un fait à propos de ma vie et vous devrez me dire si c'est la vérité ou un mensonge. Êtes-vous {mf|prêt|prête} ? Écoutez bien : j'ai causé la mort d'innocents en trahissant ma famille, mais je m'en suis sorti impunément. »
languages.original_text: "I suppose you desire entertainment. Very well. I will give you something to occupy your time — a simple game of intellect that is often played in our conclave. I will give you a fact about my life, and you will have to discern whether it is a truth or a lie. Shall we begin? I betrayed my family and caused the death of innocent people, and I was never held accountable for my actions."

traits.locale_text: « Je suppose que vous souhaitez que je vous divertisse. Très bien, j'ai de quoi vous occuper : je vous propose un simple jeu de réflexion auquel on joue souvent dans notre conclave. Je vais énoncer un fait à propos de ma vie et vous devrez me dire si c'est la vérité ou un mensonge. Êtes-vous {mf|prêt|prête} ? Écoutez bien : j'ai causé la mort d'innocents en trahissant ma famille, mais je m'en suis sorti impunément. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Supongo que busca entretenimiento. Muy bien, le daré algo con lo que ocupar su mente: un sencillo juego de intelecto popular en nuestro cónclave. Le contaré un dato sobre mi vida y usted tendrá que discernir si es cierto o falso. ¿Empezamos? Traicioné a mi familia y causé la muerte de personas inocentes, y nunca sufrí consecuencias por esos actos».
languages.original_text: "I suppose you desire entertainment. Very well. I will give you something to occupy your time — a simple game of intellect that is often played in our conclave. I will give you a fact about my life, and you will have to discern whether it is a truth or a lie. Shall we begin? I betrayed my family and caused the death of innocent people, and I was never held accountable for my actions."

traits.locale_text: «Supongo que busca entretenimiento. Muy bien, le daré algo con lo que ocupar su mente: un sencillo juego de intelecto popular en nuestro cónclave. Le contaré un dato sobre mi vida y usted tendrá que discernir si es cierto o falso. ¿Empezamos? Traicioné a mi familia y causé la muerte de personas inocentes, y nunca sufrí consecuencias por esos actos».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我猜你应该是想娱乐一下吧？很好，我可以和你玩个游戏，帮助你打发时间。这是个简单的智力游戏，我们经常在审判庭内部玩。我可以告诉你一件关于我的事情，而你负责判断这句话是真话还是假话。既然这样，我们开始吧？我要说了——我背叛了我的家人，导致无辜的人丧命，而我却根本没有为此付出过代价。”
languages.original_text: "I suppose you desire entertainment. Very well. I will give you something to occupy your time — a simple game of intellect that is often played in our conclave. I will give you a fact about my life, and you will have to discern whether it is a truth or a lie. Shall we begin? I betrayed my family and caused the death of innocent people, and I was never held accountable for my actions."

traits.locale_text: “我猜你应该是想娱乐一下吧？很好，我可以和你玩个游戏，帮助你打发时间。这是个简单的智力游戏，我们经常在审判庭内部玩。我可以告诉你一件关于我的事情，而你负责判断这句话是真话还是假话。既然这样，我们开始吧？我要说了——我背叛了我的家人，导致无辜的人丧命，而我却根本没有为此付出过代价。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「エンターテインメントがお望みですよね。分かりました。あなたが時間を潰せるものを提供しましょう。私たちのコンクラーベでよく行われる簡単な頭脳ゲームです。私の人生についての事実をお話ししますから、それが真実か嘘かを見分けてください。始めましょうか？私は家族を裏切り、罪のない人々の命を奪いました。ですが、その責任を問われることはなかった」
languages.original_text: "I suppose you desire entertainment. Very well. I will give you something to occupy your time — a simple game of intellect that is often played in our conclave. I will give you a fact about my life, and you will have to discern whether it is a truth or a lie. Shall we begin? I betrayed my family and caused the death of innocent people, and I was never held accountable for my actions."

traits.locale_text: 「エンターテインメントがお望みですよね。分かりました。あなたが時間を潰せるものを提供しましょう。私たちのコンクラーベでよく行われる簡単な頭脳ゲームです。私の人生についての事実をお話ししますから、それが真実か嘘かを見分けてください。始めましょうか？私は家族を裏切り、罪のない人々の命を奪いました。ですが、その責任を問われることはなかった」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr wünscht Euch wohl Unterhaltung. Nun gut. Ich gebe Euch etwas, womit Ihr Euch beschäftigen könnt. Ein einfaches Spiel für den Intellekt, das in unserer Konklave oft gespielt wird. Ich sage Euch etwas zu meinem Leben, und Ihr müsst herausfinden, ob es die Wahrheit ist oder eine Lüge. Wollen wir anfangen? Ich habe meine Familie verraten und den Tod von Unschuldigen verursacht, und ich wurde nie für meine Taten zur Rechenschaft gezogen."
languages.original_text: "I suppose you desire entertainment. Very well. I will give you something to occupy your time — a simple game of intellect that is often played in our conclave. I will give you a fact about my life, and you will have to discern whether it is a truth or a lie. Shall we begin? I betrayed my family and caused the death of innocent people, and I was never held accountable for my actions."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wünscht Euch wohl Unterhaltung. Nun gut. Ich gebe Euch etwas, womit Ihr Euch beschäftigen könnt. Ein einfaches Spiel für den Intellekt, das in unserer Konklave oft gespielt wird. Ich sage Euch etwas zu meinem Leben, und Ihr müsst herausfinden, ob es die Wahrheit ist oder eine Lüge. Wollen wir anfangen? Ich habe meine Familie verraten und den Tod von Unschuldigen verursacht, und ich wurde nie für meine Taten zur Rechenschaft gezogen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Sanırım eğlence arayışındasın. Pekâlâ. Sana zamanını dolduracak bir şey sunayım: Meclisimizde sıklıkla oynanan basit bir zekâ oyunu. Sana kendi hayatımla ilgili bir şey söyleyeceğim ve sen de bunun gerçek mi yalan mı olduğunu ayırt etmeye çalışacaksın. Başlayalım mı? Aileme ihanet ettim, masum insanların ölmesine sebep oldum ve yaptıklarım yüzünden asla sorumlu tutulmadım."
languages.original_text: "I suppose you desire entertainment. Very well. I will give you something to occupy your time — a simple game of intellect that is often played in our conclave. I will give you a fact about my life, and you will have to discern whether it is a truth or a lie. Shall we begin? I betrayed my family and caused the death of innocent people, and I was never held accountable for my actions."
